root.name: contract()
root.description: This function has been removed starting in revision 0124. Use subset() instead. Decreases the size of an array. The required newSize parameter provides precise control over the decrease in size.

parameter.label: array
parameter.description: booleans[], bytes[], chars[], ints[], floats[], or Strings[]

parameter.label: newSize
parameter.description: positive int: new size for the array

root.returns: Array (the same datatype as the input)
